debates.showAs: Taxes Consolidation (Development of Regional Film Industry) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 to enable the Minister to identify regions of low audiovisual capacity and to include measures in the industry development test for Section 481 tax relief to promote the development of audiovisual production outside existing major production hubs.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánacha, 1997 chun a chumasú don Aire réigiúin ina bhfuil acmhainn chlosamhairc íseal a shainaithint agus bearta a áireamh sa tástáil um fhorbairt tionscail i gcomhair faoiseamh cánach faoi Alt 481 chun forbairt léiriúcháin closamhairc a chur chun cinn lasmuigh de na moil léiriúcháin mhóra atá ann cheana.
bill.shortTitleEn: Taxes Consolidation (Development of Regional Film Industry) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Comhdhlúite Cánacha (Tionscal Scannán Réigiúnach a Fhorbairt) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Road Traffic and Roads (Blood Bikes Exemption) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Roads Act 1993 and the Road Traffic Act 1994 to exempt blood bike operators from road tolls and from restrictions from which ambulances are granted exemptions, including access to bus lanes, in the performance of their duties, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na mBóithre, 1993 agus an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1994 chun oibritheoirí rothar fola a dhíolmhú ó dholaí ar bhóithre agus ó shrianta óna ndeonaítear díolúintí d’otharchairr, lena n-áirítear rochtain ar lánaí bus, le linn dóibh a ndualgais a chomhlíonadh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Road Traffic and Roads (Blood Bikes Exemption) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre agus um Bóithre (Díolúine do Rothair Fola) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Disregard of Historic Offences for Consensual Sexual Activity Between Men Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for a process for the disregard of certain historic criminal convictions arising from consensual sexual activity between men; to amend the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission Act 2014; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le próiseas chun neamhaird a thabhairt ar chiontuithe coiriúla stairiúla áirithe a d’eascair as gníomhaíocht ghnéasach chomhthoiliúil idir fir; do leasú an Achta fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas, 2014; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Disregard of Historic Offences for Consensual Sexual Activity Between Men Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Neamhaird a Thabhairt ar Chionta Stairiúla i dtaobh Gníomhaíocht Ghnéasach Chomhthoiliúil Idir Fir, 2025

debates.showAs: Broadcasting (All Ireland Service) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009 to recognise the duty of national public service broadcasters and Coimisiún na Meán to proactively make efforts to ensure equal access to national public broadcasting services across the whole community of the island of Ireland.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009 chun aitheantas a thabhairt don dualgas atá ar chraoltóirí seirbhíse poiblí náisiúnta agus ar Choimisiún na Meán iarrachtaí a dhéanamh go réamhghníomhach chun rochtain chomhionann ar sheirbhísí craolacháin phoiblí náisiúnta a chinntiú ar fud phobal uile oileán na hÉireann.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Craolacháin (Seirbhís Uile-Éireann) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Taxes Consolidation (Rights of Performers and Film Workers) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 to ensure the certificate required for Section 481 tax relief is only issued to qualifying companies which afford equal terms to Irish performers, comply with copyright legislation, and do not engage in the practice of so-called ‘buy-out’ contracts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Comhdhlúite Cánacha, 1997 chun a chinntiú nach ndéanfar an deimhniú is gá le haghaidh faoiseamh cánach faoi Alt 481 a eisiúint ach amháin chuig cuideachtaí cáilitheacha a thugann téarmaí comhionanna do thaibheoirí Éireannacha, a chomhlíonann reachtaíocht chóipchirt, agus nach ngabhann don chleachtas ar a dtugtar conarthaí ‘imcheannaigh’.
bill.shortTitleEn: Taxes Consolidation (Rights of Performers and Film Workers) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Comhdhlúite Cánacha (Cearta Taibheoirí agus Oibrithe Scannán) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Children’s Health (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Amendment) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Children’s Health Act 2018 and therefore to amend the National Paediatric Hospital Development Board (Establishment) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 246 of 2007) so as to direct that the National Children’s Hospital be named Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Shláinte Leanaí, 2018 agus, dá bhrí sin, do leasú an Ordaithe um Bord Forbartha an Ospidéil Náisiúnta Phéidiatraicigh (Bunú), 2007 (I.R. Uimh. 246 de 2007) d’fhonn a threorú go dtabharfar Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí ar Ospidéal Náisiúnta na Leanaí.
bill.shortTitleEn: Children’s Health (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Amendment) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shláinte Leanaí (Ospidéal Náisiúnta Kathleen Lynn do Leanaí) (Leasú), 2025

debates.showAs: Arts (Recognition of Comedy) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Arts (Recognition of Comedy) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Arts (Recognition of Comedy) (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Arts Act 2003 to recognise the art of comedy.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Ealaíon, 2003 chun ealaín na coiméide a aithint.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Ealaíon (Coiméide a Aithint) (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Oversight of RTÉ Accounts) (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009 to give the Comptroller and Auditor General oversight of RTÉ accounts.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009 chun formhaoirsiú ar chuntais RTÉ a thabhairt don Ard-Reachtaire Cuntas agus Ciste.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Craolacháin (Formhaoirsiú ar Chuntais RTÉ) (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Child Care (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the sale of nitrous oxide gas by prohibiting its sale in a reusable cylinder or disposable cartridge to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years and for that purpose to amend the Child Care Act 1991 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun díol gáis ocsaíde nítriúla a rialáil trí thoirmeasc a chur lena dhíol i sorcóir in-athúsáidte nó i gcartús indiúscartha le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chúram Leanaí (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, to define its functions in relation to the preservation, restoration and management of the cultural historical quarter within the Moore Street Battlefield Area in line with the functions, aims and objectives set for it in this Act and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, do mhíniú a fheidhmeanna i ndáil leis an gceathrú chultúir stairiúil laistigh de Limistéar Mhachaire Catha Shráid an Mhúraigh a chaomhnú, a aisiriú agus a bhainistiú de réir na bhfeidhmeanna, na n-aidhmeanna agus na gcuspóirí atá leagtha amach dó san Acht seo agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheathrú Chultúir 1916, 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2020 to give Gardaí the power to seize and detain quad bikes and scrambler motorcycles when being used unlawfully including in public parks and green spaces and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2020 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt do Ghardaí cuadrothair agus gluaisrothair streachailte a urghabháil agus a choinneáil nuair a úsáidtear go neamhdhleathach iad, lena n-áirítear i bpáirceanna poiblí agus i spásanna glasa, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Cuadrothair agus Gluaisrothair Streachailte) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Statistics (Decade of Centenaries) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Statistics (Decade of Centenaries) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Statistics (Decade of Centenaries) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Statistics Act 1993, in relation to the first census of the population of Ireland taken since the establishment of the State; to afford that census a special heritage status and to have such released to the public for historical, genealogical and other research as part of the national Decade of Centenaries commemorations.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Staidrimh, 1993 i ndáil leis an gcéad daonáireamh ar Éirinn a rinneadh ó bunaíodh an Stát; do thabhairt stádas oidhreachta speisialta don daonáireamh sin agus do chur faoi deara é a chur ar fáil don phobal le haghaidh taighde staire, ginealais agus eile mar chuid de na cuimhneacháin náisiúnta — na Deich mBliana de Chomórthaí Céad Bliain.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Staidrimh (Na Deich mBliana de Chomórthaí Céad Bliain), 2020

debates.showAs: Thirty-Eighth Amendment of the Constitution (Neutrality) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Thirty-Eighth Amendment of the Constitution (Neutrality) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
An Bille um an Ochtú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Neodracht), 2018: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-Eighth Amendment of the Constitution (Neutrality) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-Eighth Amendment of the Constitution (Neutrality) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Ochtú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Neodracht), 2018

debates.showAs: Údarás na Gaeltachta (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for democratic elections to Údarás na Gaeltachta and for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toghcháin dhaonlathacha 
chun Údarás na Gaeltachta agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás na Gaeltachta (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Roads (Amendment) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Roads Act 1993 to exempt sea and river rescue teams from road tolls and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na mBóithre, 1993 chun foirne tarrthála ar muir agus in aibhneacha a dhíolmhú ó dholaí ar bhóithre agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na mBóithre (Leasú), 2017

debates.showAs: Neighbour Disputes (Vegetation) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Neighbour Disputes (Vegetation) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to address neighbour disputes concerning vegetation that causes a nuisance including the obstruction of sunlight; to provide for mediation of neighbour disputes and formal adjudication if necessary by adjudication officers appointed by local authorities; to provide for the appeal and enforcement of decisions made by adjudication officers; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thabhairt aghaidh ar dhíospóidí idir comharsana a bhaineann le fásra is cúis le núis, lena n-áirítear bac ar sholas na gréine; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hidirghabháil a dhéanamh i dtaca le díospóidí idir comharsana agus maidir le hoifigigh bhreithniúcháin arna gceapadh ag údaráis áitiúla do dhéanamh breithniú foirmiúil, más gá, ar dhíospóidí idir comharsana; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hachomharc a dhéanamh in aghaidh breitheanna arna dtabhairt ag oifigigh bhreithniúcháin agus maidir le breitheanna den sórt sin a fhorfheidhmiú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíospóidí idir Comharsana (Fásra), 2017

debates.showAs: Trade Union (Garda Síochána and the Defence Forces) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to remove the bar on a Garda Síochána or Defence Forces association from associating with, or affiliating to, any trade union or any other association; to remove the bar on a Defence Force member from becoming a member of a Defence Force association that may wish to reconstitute itself as a trade union; and to prohibit the use of strike action by an Garda Síochána or Defence Forces associations and trade unions for reasons of public safety
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun deireadh a chur leis an gcosc ar chomhlachas de chuid an Gharda Síochána nó na bhFórsaí Cosanta comhlachas a dhéanamh, nó cleamhnú, le haon cheardchumann ná le haon chomhlachas eile; chun deireadh a chur leis an gcosc ar chomhalta de na Fórsaí Cosanta teacht chun bheith ina chomhalta nó ina comhalta de chomhlachas de chuid na bhFórsaí Cosanta, ar comhlachas é a bhféadfadh sé gur mhian leis é féin a athbhunú mar cheardchumann; agus chun a thoirmeasc ar chomhlachais de chuid an Gharda Síochána nó na bhFórsaí Cosanta, ar chúiseanna sábháilteachta poiblí, gníomh stailce a úsáid
bill.shortTitleEn: Trade Union (Garda Síochána and the Defence Forces) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Ceardchumann (An Garda Síochána agus na Fórsaí Cosanta), 2017

Public Holidays (Lá na Poblachta) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the amendment of the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 and establishment of a body to be known as Bord Lá na Poblachta and for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Acht um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 a leasú agus maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Bord Lá na Poblachta agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

Statistics (1916 Rising Centenary) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Statistics Act 1993, in relation to the first Census of Population of Ireland taken since the establishment of the State; to afford that census a special heritage status and to have such released to the public for historical, genealogical and other research as part of the national centenary of the 1916 Rising, and the Decade of Centenaries, commemorations
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Staidrimh, 1993 i ndáil leis an gcéad Daonáireamh ar Éirinn a rinneadh ó bunaíodh an Stát; do thabhairt stádas oidhreachta speisialta don daonáireamh sin agus do chur faoi deara é a chur ar fáil don phobal le haghaidh taighde staire, ginealais agus eile mar chuid de chomóradh náisiúnta céad bliain Éirí Amach 1916 agus na Deich mBliana de Chomóradh Céad Bliain
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Staidrimh (Céad Bliain Éirí Amach 1916), 2016

debates.showAs: Gender Recognition Bill 2013: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the legal recognition of the preferred gender identity of persons so seeking and to ensure respect for the rights and dignity of such persons
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le haitheantas dlí a thabhairt do rogha féiniúlachta inscne daoine a iarrann an céanna agus chun a chinntiú go mbeidh meas ar chearta agus ar dhínit na ndaoine sin
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Inscne a Aithint, 2013

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the amendment of the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997 and establishment of a body to be known as Bord Lá na Poblachta and for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Acht um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997 a leasú agus maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Bord Lá na Poblachta agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Laethanta Saoire Poiblí (Lá na Poblachta), 2013

debates.showAs: Social Welfare (Amnesty) Bill 2012: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Social Welfare (Amnesty) Bill 2012: Second Stage [Private Members]

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to introduce a temporary amnesty with respect to social welfare overpayments
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun ilphardún sealadach a thabhairt isteach maidir le ró-íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Leasa Shóisialaigh (Ilphardún), 2012

debates.showAs: Non-Medicinal Psychoactive Substances Bill 2010: First Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make new provision for the regulation, registration and licensing of the sale, importation, distribution and production of non-medicinal psychoactive substances and the establishment of a body known as an tÚdarás Rialála um Shubstaintí Neamhleigheasacha Sícighníomhacha ("an tÚdarás") and in English as the Non-Medicinal Psychoactive Substances Regulatory Authority ("the Authority") and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú nua maidir le rialáil, clárú agus ceadúnú i dtaca le díol, allmhairiú, dáileadh agus táirgeadh substaintí neamhleigheasacha sícighníomhacha agus maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar an tÚdarás Rialála um Shubstaintí Neamhleigheasacha Sícighníomhacha ("an tÚdarás") agus, sa Bhéarla,  the Non-Medicinal Psychoactive Substances Regulatory Authority ("the Authority") agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shubstaintí Neamhleigheasacha Sícighníomhacha 2010

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Human Rights Commission Act 2000

bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Choimisiúin um Chearta an Duine (Leasú) 2008

Juries (Amendment) Bill 2008: First Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2002 to restore the oblications in relation to the provision of social and affordable housing which existed under Part V of the Planning and Development Act 2000 prior to the amendment of that act in 2002
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt 2000 go 2002 chun na hoibleagáidí i ndáil le soláthar tithíochta sóisialta agus tithíochta incheannaithe a aiseag ar oibleagáidí iad a bhí ann faoi Chuid V den Acht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt 2000 roimh an Acht sin a leasú sa bhliain 2002
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) 2006

bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'aisghairm na nAchtanna um Chiontaí in aghaidh an Stáit 1939 go 1998
